item.title: xkcd 1313: Something is Wrong on the Internet!
item.description: I found that the rollover text, “/bu|[rn]t|[coy]e|[mtg]a|j|iso|n[hl]|[ae]d|lev|sh|[lnd]i|[po]o|ls/ matches the last names of elected US presidents but not their opponents.”, is obviously false. After all there are several last names (like “Nixon …
item.dc:creator: Nacho Cano
